people_also_ask.question: Is Tony Hawk skater 1 and 2 worth it?
people_also_ask.heading: The crispness of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2 is really great on Xbox and PlayStation, but the Switch version is way better than I expected. It looks really good, despite a loss in visual fidelity. ... The game might feature better experiences on other consoles, but the Switch version is more than just a port.28-Jun-2021
people_also_ask.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2 Switch Review - Is It Worth It?

people_also_ask.question: Does Tony Hawk Pro skater 1 and 2 have a story?
people_also_ask.heading: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 doesn't really have a story mode. What it has instead is a single-player campaign. The campaign brings the player to different locales, tasks them to complete various challenges, and then moves on once the player completes them.08-Sep-2020
people_also_ask.title: Does Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 Have Story Mode? - Guide ...

people_also_ask.question: Is Spiderman in Tony Hawk Pro skater 2?
people_also_ask.heading: For those that don't know: the Marvel comic series character isn't available in the former game, but he is available in the latter, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2. More specifically, Spidey is available as an unlockable character to all players who get 100% in Career Mode with a created skater.13-May-2020
people_also_ask.title: Will Spider-Man Be in the Tony Hawk Pro Skater Remake?

people_also_ask.question: Is Tony Hawk Pro skater 2 on PC?
people_also_ask.heading: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 is a good, trial version game only available for Windows, being part of the category PC games with subcategory Sport and has been published by Activision. It's available for users with the operating system Windows 95 and prior versions, and you can get it only in English.

knowledge_panel.description: tony hawk's pro skater 2 is a skateboarding video game developed by neversoft and published by activision. it is the second installment in the tony hawk's series of sports games and was released for the playstation in 2000, with subsequent ports to microsoft windows, game boy color, and dreamcast the same year. wikipedia
